scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.deploy:back: git pull origin master && pm2 restart server.js
scripts.deploy:front: git pull origin master && cd client && npm run build && rm -rf /var/www/html/* && cp build/* /var/www/html -r
scripts.deploy:full: git pull origin master && pm2 restart server.js && cd client && npm run build && rm -rf /var/www/html/* && cp build/* /var/www/html -r
